Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored a game-high 37 points, making nine of his 15 3-point attempts
Others: Anthony Edwards has shown a significant increase in his 3-point volume and is capitalizing on teams failing to close out
Edwards is averaging 28.0 points, 5.9 rebounds, and 3.4 assists, shooting 48.2% from the field and an eye-popping 46.1% from 3-point range
